content.rendered:
Directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali

Written by Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Prakash Kapadia

Cast Deepika Padukone (Padmavati). Ranveer Singh (Sultan Alauddin Khilji). Shahid Kapoor (Maharawal Ratan Singh). Aditi Rao Hydari (Mehrunissa). Jim Sarbh (Malik Kafur). Anupriya Goenka (Nagmati). Raza Murad (Jalaluddin Khilji). Ujjwal Chopra (Gora Singh). Komal Chhabria (Jalaluddin’s Wife). Lankesh Bhardwaj (Tribhuvan Pal). Bhawani Muzamil (Amir Khusro (as Muzzamil Bhavani)). Hriiday Malhotra (Sujaan Singh). Deepak Shreemali (Badal Singh). Manish Wadhwa (Gandharvasen). Gulshan Walia (Head Monk). Chintoo Singh Vasir (Jalal’s Darbar Musician 2). Gopal Thakur (Wrestler 2). Sharhaan Singh (Vijaydaan Singh). Alisha Soni (Rajput Maid). Daljit Sean Singh (Shareef Pasha (as Daljeet Sean Singh)). Manjit Singh (Farouk Affandi). Saarrh Kkashyap (Wardhan (as Saar Kashyap)). Swaroop Khan (Rajput Musician). Rohit Choudhary (Ikhtiyaar). Aslam Anwar (Jalal’s Minister 1). Akshay Sharma (Jalal’s Minister 2). Anuj Sharma (Khilji Messenger). Anuj Khurana (Bijuriya) . Ashwin Dhar (Ulugh Khan). Arvinder Shagmer Gill (Tejveer). Nazir Hussian (Mongol Chief). Aneesha Joshi (Binte Dil Dancer). Anisha Joshi (Dancer Binte Dil). Mayank Kathak (Jalal’s Darbar Musician 3). Ayaz Khan (Hakeem). Aayam Mehta (Raghav Chetan). Meena Mehta (Jalal’s Darbar Dancer). Veena Mehta (Suraj Baisa). Qutee Negpal (Shanze). Priyanka Pawar (Chittai). Mursaleem Qureshi (Mursaleen). Padmavati Rao (Kunwar Baisa). Vibhav Roy (Itaat Khan). Mohammad Sakir (Mohammad). Deepak Sharma (Wrestler 1). Sanjeev Sharma (Hajuriya). Farhan Siddique (Ashfaq). Deependra Singh (Rajput Warrior)

Languages Hindi. Tamil. Rajasthani

Producers Ajit Andhare. Hansraj Bhaktawala. Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Chetan Deolekar. Arvinder Gill. Raghav Khanna. Pratik Rawal. Shobha Sant. Sudhanshu Vats

Production Bhansali Production. Prime Focu. Prime Focus
